labels.analysis: The MCP Server focuses on integrating with Zendesk, a popular customer support platform, enabling users to interact with Zendesk tickets and data through a standardized interface. The tools allow for retrieval, search, creation, updating of tickets, adding notes, and fetching linked incidents. This streamlines customer support workflows by allowing seamless integration with LLM-powered applications, enhancing automation and efficiency in handling customer queries and support tickets.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Customer Support" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around managing Zendesk tickets, which is a fundamental aspect of customer support operations. The secondary labels "API Integration" and "Daily Productivity" are relevant because the server acts as an API interface to Zendesk, facilitating automation and productivity enhancements in customer support workflows.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Zendesk Integration Server
server_info_crawled.author: @koundinya/zd-mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Enable seamless interaction with Zendesk tickets and data through a standardized MCP interface. Retrieve, search, create, and update tickets, as well as add notes and fetch linked incidents, all via simple tool calls. Streamline customer support workflows by integrating Zendesk capabilities directly into your LLM-powered applications.

tools.name: zendesk_get_ticket
tools.description: Deploy Server Zendesk Integration Server Claim Server @koundinya/zd-mcp-server Try in Playground zendesk_get_ticket

tools.name: zendesk_add_private_note
tools.description: Add a private internal note to a Zendesk ticket

tools.name: zendesk_add_public_note
tools.description: Add a public comment to a Zendesk ticket

tools.name: zendesk_search
tools.description: Search for Zendesk tickets based on a query

tools.name: zendesk_get_ticket_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a Zendesk ticket including comments

tools.name: zendesk_get_linked_incidents
tools.description: Fetch all incident tickets linked to a particular ticket

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@koundinya/zd-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
